title: Marriyum asks PML-N candidates for Punjab PA elections to submit applications by March 18
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Tuesday said Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz candidates, aspiring to participate in forthcoming Punjab Provincial Assembly election, should immediately submit applications to the PML-N Central Secretariat, 180 H, Model, Lahore.
In a tweet, she said the last date for submission of applications was March 18.
She said in line with the decision of the party, the candidates were once again informed to submit their applications as soon as possible.
